Dark shadows break away from the earth's moon and stealthily slip into
the confines of the earth. As silent as death and as smooth as silk
they make their way through the earth's skies. At first careful only to
just barely touch the inside the atmosphere, like a stone skipping off
a blue lit pond, and then with increasing boldness they slip within the
embrace of earthï¿½s atmosphere, to watch with great interest the
inhabitants of this planet. 

Invisible to the optic and sensor alike the silent invaders take
passive scans of the limping prison ship, the damaged orbital factory
and the plethora of biological and technological forms on the planet
below. Like a whispering vapor they examine and move about, and then
just as suddenly as they have come, they vanish. 

But they will return ....

---------------------------------------

OOC: I would suspect that if anyone is monitoring from Cryonosis, they
may have picked up something, but only intermittantly, and with no
definite readings. It could be mistaken for fog, only it was moving. It
would take someone skilled and awake at thier post to see even this
much. 

OOC: THE PRISON SHIP - Did you want to be part of this as well? I could
ignore you if you like or bring you and your prisoners in on it as
well? It may not happen next post, but I am just curious.

OOC: I hope to be posting the next move for Cyclonus, Scourge and the
crew perhaps tommorrow. If Nic is unable to post, I certainly
understand, and if he does not want me to auto Vorpal, I can understand
that too. Nightstrike, did you want to come along if Vorpal is unable
to respond in time? In either case I will bring us to earth, and all
the fun that will bring! >:)

Preston
(Minions!)
